questions.E: You prefer to direct your energy to deal with people, things, situations.
questions.I: You prefer to direct your energy to study ideas, information, explanations or beliefs.

questions.S: You prefer to deal with facts, proven procedures, what you know, a realist here & now.
questions.N: You prefer to deal with ideas, look into the unknown, to generate new possibilities or to unticipate what isn/'t obvious.

questions.T: You prefer to decide on the basis of logic, using an analytic and impersonal approach.
questions.F: You prefer to decide using values, or beliefs, using a subjective, people oriented approach.

questions.J: You prefer your life to be planned in a stable and organised way
questions.P: You prefer to go with the flow, have flexibility & respond to events

ESTJ.strengths: Enthusiastic people who are driven to fulfil their obligations and duties. They are committed to relationships which they consider to be lifelong & unalterable – Good in atight spot
ESTJ.weaknesses: Tendency to always needing to be in charge and maybe controlling of friends & colleagues.

ESFJ.strengths: Warm hearted individuals who highly value their relationships. Customer focused with the ability to bring out the best of people.
ESFJ.weaknesses: Can be self-sacrificing and may not pay enough attention to their own needs

ISTJ.strengths: Honour their commitments, Able to take constructive criticism well
ISTJ.weaknesses: Tendency to believe that they're always right, Their value for structure may seem rigid to others

ISFJ.strengths: Warm, friendly and affirming by nature. Excellent organizational capabilities
ISFJ.weaknesses: Extreme dislike of conflict and criticism. Unlikely to express their needs, which may cause pent-up frustrations

ESTP.strengths: They love action and always seem to be doing something. Clear-headed when dealing with emergencies.
ESTP.weaknesses: Get bored easily. Enjoys lavishing loved ones with big gifts

ESFP.strengths: Generous & will go out of their way to help a colleagues. Live for the moment & know how to make the most of each moment.
ESFP.weaknesses: Can take conflict personally. Resist relationships that require them to function on a high intuitive or thinking level

ISTP.strengths: Usually self-confident, are not threatened by conflict or criticism
ISTP.weaknesses: They thrive on action and excitement, and may stir things up to create it

ISFP.strengths: Flexible and laid-back, usually willing to defer to their mates, Warm, friendly and affirming by nature
ISFP.weaknesses: Extreme dislike of conflict and criticism. Tendency to hold back their thoughts and feelings, unless drawn out

ENTJ.strengths: Enjoys lively intellectual conversations - welcoming such interactions as a learning opportunity

ENTP.strengths: Laid back and can get along with almost all other types of people. Enjoy dicussing & debating theories and concepts that interests them.
ENTP.weaknesses: Can initiate arguments because they enjoy the debate.

INTJ.strengths: Not threatened by conflict or criticism, Able to leave relationships which should be ended
INTJ.weaknesses: May be insensitive at times. Tendency to be unwilling or unable to accept blame

INTP.strengths: Approach things which interest them very enthusiastically, Richly imaginative and creative
INTP.weaknesses: Tend to be suspicious and distrusting of others, Tend to "blow off" conflict situations by ignoring them, or else they "blow up" in heated anger

ENFJ.strengths: Warm sociable people who are keenly in tune with other’s feeling & perspectives
ENFJ.weaknesses: s Well defined value systems can make them inflexible in some areas

ENFP.strengths: See the best in people and likely to bring out the best in people. Put a lot of effort into making thing work out between people

INFJ.strengths: Have very high expectations for themselves and others (both a strength and weakness). Sensitive and concerned for others' feelings
INFJ.weaknesses: Extreme dislike of conflict and criticism

INFP.strengths: Have Driven to meet other's needs, Strive for "win-win" situations
INFP.weaknesses: May tend to be shy and reserved , Perfectionist tendencies may cause them to not give themselves enough credit
